languages.text: "Повстанцы неплохо вооружены и обучены. Более того, советники госпожи губернатора склонны полагать, что зачинщики бунтов прекрасно знакомы с рельефом и климатическими особенностями планеты. Мои ординаты денно и нощно просматривают регистрационные записи жителей, прошедших военную подготовку, но пока вычислить негодяя не удалось".

traits.locale_text: "Повстанцы неплохо вооружены и обучены. Более того, советники госпожи губернатора склонны полагать, что зачинщики бунтов прекрасно знакомы с рельефом и климатическими особенностями планеты. Мои ординаты денно и нощно просматривают регистрационные записи жителей, прошедших военную подготовку, но пока вычислить негодяя не удалось".

languages.text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."
languages.original_text: "Повстанцы неплохо вооружены и обучены. Более того, советники госпожи губернатора склонны полагать, что зачинщики бунтов прекрасно знакомы с рельефом и климатическими особенностями планеты. Мои ординаты денно и нощно просматривают регистрационные записи жителей, прошедших военную подготовку, но пока вычислить негодяя не удалось".

What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

languages.text: “那些叛军武器精良，训练有素。更重要的是，总督的顾问们认为，煽动叛乱的人对这颗行星的地形与气候非常熟悉。我的行政文员正在日以继夜地翻阅登记记录，寻找接受过军事训练的人，但我们至今都无法确定这个幕后黑手的真实身份。”
languages.original_text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

traits.locale_text: “那些叛军武器精良，训练有素。更重要的是，总督的顾问们认为，煽动叛乱的人对这颗行星的地形与气候非常熟悉。我的行政文员正在日以继夜地翻阅登记记录，寻找接受过军事训练的人，但我们至今都无法确定这个幕后黑手的真实身份。”

languages.text: «Los rebeldes cuentan con buenas armas y están entrenados. Y lo que es más, los consejeros de la gobernadora creen que los instigadores de la rebelión conocen muy bien el terreno y el clima del planeta. Mis subordinados están revisando los registros día y noche en busca de individuos con un entrenamiento militar completo, pero, hasta el momento, no han identificado al canalla responsable».
languages.original_text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

traits.locale_text: «Los rebeldes cuentan con buenas armas y están entrenados. Y lo que es más, los consejeros de la gobernadora creen que los instigadores de la rebelión conocen muy bien el terreno y el clima del planeta. Mis subordinados están revisando los registros día y noche en busca de individuos con un entrenamiento militar completo, pero, hasta el momento, no han identificado al canalla responsable».

languages.text: 「反乱軍は武装も訓練もしっかりしています。その上、総督の相談役は反乱を扇動している者はこの星の地形と気候にかなり精通していると考えているようです。私のオーディネイトが、完璧な軍事教育を受けたことのある者を登録記録から日夜探していますが、その悪党を突き止めることは今のところできていないのです」
languages.original_text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱軍は武装も訓練もしっかりしています。その上、総督の相談役は反乱を扇動している者はこの星の地形と気候にかなり精通していると考えているようです。私のオーディネイトが、完璧な軍事教育を受けたことのある者を登録記録から日夜探していますが、その悪党を突き止めることは今のところできていないのです」

languages.text: "Die Rebellen sind gut bewaffnet und ausgebildet. Zudem glauben die Berater der Gouverneurin, dass die Verursacher der Aufstände mit Terrain und Klima des Planeten bestens vertraut sind. Meine Ordinaten suchen Tag und Nacht in den Registrierungsunterlagen nach Individuen mit abgeschlossener militärischer Ausbildung, aber bislang konnten wir den Schurken noch nicht identifizieren."
languages.original_text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

traits.locale_text: "Die Rebellen sind gut bewaffnet und ausgebildet. Zudem glauben die Berater der Gouverneurin, dass die Verursacher der Aufstände mit Terrain und Klima des Planeten bestens vertraut sind. Meine Ordinaten suchen Tag und Nacht in den Registrierungsunterlagen nach Individuen mit abgeschlossener militärischer Ausbildung, aber bislang konnten wir den Schurken noch nicht identifizieren."

languages.text: « Ces rebelles sont adéquatement armés et formés au combat. De plus, les conseillers de la gouverneure pensent que les instigateurs des soulèvements connaissent très bien le relief et le climat de la planète. Mes subalternes épluchent les registres de population jour et nuit en quête d'individus ayant suivi une formation militaire, mais nous n'avons pas encore réussi à identifier le scélérat qui est derrière tout cela. »
languages.original_text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

traits.locale_text: « Ces rebelles sont adéquatement armés et formés au combat. De plus, les conseillers de la gouverneure pensent que les instigateurs des soulèvements connaissent très bien le relief et le climat de la planète. Mes subalternes épluchent les registres de population jour et nuit en quête d'individus ayant suivi une formation militaire, mais nous n'avons pas encore réussi à identifier le scélérat qui est derrière tout cela. »

languages.text: "İsyancıların eğitimleri de teçhizatları da sağlam. Dahası, valinin danışmanları, isyanları düzenleyenlerin gezegenin arazisi ile iklimine fazlasıyla aşina olduğunu düşünüyor. Meslektaşlarım gece gündüz sicil kayıtlarını inceleyip askerî eğitimini tamamlamış kişileri tarıyor. Lakin şu ana kadar hainin kimliğini tespit edemedik."
languages.original_text: "The rebels are well armed and well trained. What's more, the governor's advisors are inclined to think that the instigators of the rebellions are very familiar with the planet's terrain and climate. My ordinates are going through registration records day and night, looking for individuals who have completed military training, but we have so far been unable to identify the scoundrel."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancıların eğitimleri de teçhizatları da sağlam. Dahası, valinin danışmanları, isyanları düzenleyenlerin gezegenin arazisi ile iklimine fazlasıyla aşina olduğunu düşünüyor. Meslektaşlarım gece gündüz sicil kayıtlarını inceleyip askerî eğitimini tamamlamış kişileri tarıyor. Lakin şu ana kadar hainin kimliğini tespit edemedik."
